dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Emergency sirens that were expected to sound across Kazakhstan at 9:00 a.m. on May 22 were deliberately kept silent to avoid disturbing end-of-school-year celebrations, the Ministry of Emergency Situations (MES) explained.

dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They were supposed to sound at 9 a.m. for the Ört-2025 drill, but they kept it silent.
